title: Acount Deletion
body: I think that riot has been removing accounts that have not been used recently. Happened three times to me. my previous account was also supposed to have 1950 rp but it all got deleted or something. RIOT. STOP ACOUNT DELTION<3!!!

replies.body: We don't delete accounts unless it's done through a specific request by the verified account owner.  If you are unable to access your account, a piece of information may have been changed or you are logging into the wrong region.  As a first step, go over our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help regain access.  Let me know if you have any questions or if your issue persists, and I'd be happy to help!
Riot doesn't delete accounts, it's likely your account may have been compromised. As CrazFight mentioned, submit a request to get this solved.

If you have an issue with one of your accounts being "Wrongfully" deleted with RP, you can send in a[ Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to try and resolve this issue.
